HotelElement.Name: Aparthotel Monarque Sultan (Formerly Sultan Club Marbella )

Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Sultan Club Marbella places you in the heart of Marbella, convenient to Fontanilla Beach and Marbella Marina. This 4-star aparthotel is within close proximity of Venus Beach and Orange Square.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 76 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring kitchens with refrigerators and microwaves. Rooms have private furnished balconies or patios. Plasma televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include safes and separate sitting areas, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Pamper yourself with onsite body treatments and facials. If you're looking for recreational opportunities, you'll find a health club, an outdoor pool, and an indoor pool. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, a television in the lobby, and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at a coffee shop/café serving guests of Sultan Club Marbella. While enjoying a refreshing dip in the aparthotel pool, you can order your favorite drink at the poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Planning an event in Marbella? This aparthotel has facilities measuring 538 square feet (50 square meters), including a meeting room. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 2 PM

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Venus Beach - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Orange Square - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi

The preferred airport for Sultan Club Marbella is Jerez de La Frontera (XRY) - 107.2 km / 66.6 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
